work_experience.title: Frontend Developer (Mobile)
work_experience.experience: I was responsible for building and maintaining a production-level cross-platform e-commerce app. The features I have implemented for the app includes: authentication, deeplinking, routing, and form management.

work_experience.title: Founder/Manager
work_experience.experience: I started a small online jewelry business with a friend while studying web development. I was responsible for implementing the website in Shopify, administrating, and accounting. This gave me the perspective of running a business that might be useful in evaluating the trade-offs between the cost of development vs the benefits to the business, should that be my responsibility.

work_experience.title: Intern
work_experience.experience: While working as an intern in this Ad agency, I interacted with clients, discussed specifications, and executed and/or relayed their expections to team members. I also learned about business processes and the industry as a whole. My team started from 4 team members and grew to 20 members by the time I left, giving me a good insight into the changing team dynamic.
